price: (52) Or am I [not] better than this one [i.e., Moses] who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?[1442]
arabic: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ
footnotes: [1442]- That was true previous to his appointment as a prophet, at which time Allāh corrected his speech impediment.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
